resources.string:
Hi, my name is Leon, I live in Linz and I like to code. 

 In the last six months I've been trying to build a software startup, unfortunately that didn't go to well.
 I acquiered my first customer and eventually had a lot of trouble with them...
 They didn't pay me at all which was quiet concerning, and because of that we almost got into a legal fight...
 Luckily things turned out okay, because I of course didn't do anything wrong!
 

 I think this describes me really good. I'm adventurous, and like to try things out, and like to do things unconventionally.
